projects.title: Kish Financial Institution
projects.briefDescription: Web development project for Kish Financial Institution, a non-profit organization, encompasses a comprehensive design and development process, incorporating both front-end and back-end components. From visually appealing user interfaces to robust functionality, the project aims to create an intuitive and secure online platform for the institution's financial services.

technologies.name: React
technologies.description: React is the core framework employed in the project, facilitating the creation of dynamic and interactive user interfaces through its component-based architecture.

technologies.name: Material UI
technologies.description: Material UI is a widely used library in the project, providing a set of customizable and pre-designed UI elements that have been extensively utilized and modified to match the desired design aesthetic.

technologies.name: React Router Dom
technologies.description: React Hook Form is a form validation library integrated into the project, simplifying the process of implementing robust and efficient forms by utilizing React hooks.

technologies.name: React Hook Form
technologies.description: React Hook Form is a form validation library integrated into the project, simplifying the process of implementing robust and efficient forms by utilizing React hooks.

technologies.name: Axios
technologies.description: Axios is a popular HTTP client used to handle API requests in the project. It offers a simple and intuitive interface for making asynchronous HTTP calls to external services.

technologies.name: Material Icons
technologies.description: Material Icons is an icon library utilized in the project, providing a wide range of scalable and customizable icons that adhere to the material design principles. These icons enhance the visual appeal and usability of the application.

features: Streamlined user authentication with an intuitive login and sign-up interface
Seamless user photo upload functionality for personalized profiles
Efficient user data editing capabilities for maintaining up-to-date information
Real-time message and notification system for smooth communication with the server
Convenient integration for adding membership fees and submitting loan requests
Comprehensive loan eligibility checks to ensure accurate assessments
Reliable payment recording system to track and manage user transactions

projects.briefDescription: The website design for a travel agency.
features: Responsive Design
User-Centered Design
Visual Appeal and Branding

projects.title: Kish Financial Institution
projects.briefDescription: The project is a backend application developed in Node.js, providing robust functionality for user authentication, profile management, and seamless integration with a MySQL database. It handles essential tasks such as secure login and sign-up processes, efficient user photo uploading, token generation, and authorization for each request. Additionally, it incorporates CRUD operations to facilitate seamless interaction with the MySQL database. By leveraging Node.js and Express.js, the project ensures efficient request handling and secure routing. Overall, this professional backend project delivers a reliable and scalable solution for managing user data and authentication in a web application.

features: RESTful APIs for user and admin actions (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Utilized Sequelize as an ORM for database management
Implemented bcrypt for password hashing
Authentication and authorization handled through JSON Web Tokens (JWT)
File management and uploading achieved using Multer in Node.js
Routing requests efficiently with Express Router
Developed middleware functions for token validation and admin authorization
Designed a SQL database with over ten interconnected tables
Implemented admin actions and confirmation functionality

projects.title: Fanshion
projects.briefDescription: This web development project caters to fashion enthusiasts, offering them a visually appealing platform to share reviews and content. It leverages Firebase's features, including Firestore, Storage, and Authentication, to store products, user data, and profile pictures securely. Users can easily share their fashion reviews while enjoying a seamless and interactive experience.

projects.title: Arman's Portfolio
projects.briefDescription: My portfolio web project is built using Vue.js and Tailwind CSS, combining the power of a versatile JavaScript framework and a utility-first CSS framework. This project showcases an individual's professional achievements, skills, and projects in a visually appealing manner. Vue.js enables dynamic and interactive components, facilitating seamless navigation and smooth transitions. Tailwind CSS provides a wide range of pre-designed utility classes, allowing for rapid and flexible styling. The combination of Vue.js and Tailwind CSS ensures an efficient and modern development process, resulting in a visually captivating and responsive portfolio website that effectively highlights the individual's expertise and accomplishments.
